preferences.name: Read Calendar
preferences.description: Allows the app to read events from your calendar.

preferences.name: Write Calendar
preferences.description: Allows the app to add or modify events in your calendar.

preferences.name: Camera
preferences.description: Allows the app to access the device camera.

preferences.name: Read Contacts
preferences.description: Allows the app to read your contacts.

preferences.name: Write Contacts
preferences.description: Allows the app to add or modify your contacts.

preferences.name: Fine Location
preferences.description: Allows the app to access precise location.

preferences.name: Coarse Location
preferences.description: Allows the app to access approximate location.

preferences.name: Record Audio
preferences.description: Allows the app to record audio.

preferences.name: Read Phone State
preferences.description: Allows the app to access information about the phone.

preferences.name: Call Phone
preferences.description: Allows the app to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call.

preferences.name: Read Call Log
preferences.description: Allows the app to read your call log.

preferences.name: Write Call Log
preferences.description: Allows the app to add or modify your call log.

preferences.name: Process Outgoing Calls
preferences.description: Allows the app to process outgoing calls.

preferences.name: Send SMS
preferences.description: Allows the app to send SMS messages.

preferences.name: Receive SMS
preferences.description: Allows the app to receive SMS messages.

preferences.name: Read External Storage
preferences.description: Allows the app to read from external storage.

preferences.name: Write External Storage
preferences.description: Allows the app to write to external storage.

preferences.name: Access Network State
preferences.description: Allows the app to access information about networks.

preferences.name: Access WiFi State
preferences.description: Allows the app to access information about Wi-Fi networks.

preferences.name: Change Network State
preferences.description: Allows the app to change network connectivity state.

preferences.name: Change WiFi State
preferences.description: Allows the app to change Wi-Fi connectivity state.

preferences.name: Bluetooth
preferences.description: Allows the app to connect to paired bluetooth devices.

preferences.name: Bluetooth Admin
preferences.description: Allows the app to discover and pair bluetooth devices.

preferences.name: Wake Lock
preferences.description: Allows the app to keep the processor from sleeping or the screen from dimming.

preferences.name: Accessibility Service
preferences.description: Allows the app to use accessibility services.

preferences.name: Voice Interaction
preferences.description: Allows the app to recognize voice commands.

engineData.name: Fuel System
engineData.description: Monitors the fuel system of the vehicle.

engineData.name: Engine Load
engineData.description: Measures the current engine load.

engineData.name: Coolant Temperature
engineData.description: Monitors the coolant temperature of the engine.

engineData.name: Fuel Pressure
engineData.description: Monitors the fuel pressure in the vehicle.

engineData.name: MAF Pressure
engineData.description: Monitors the MAF (Mass Air Flow) pressure.

engineData.name: RPM
engineData.description: Monitors the engine revolutions per minute.

engineData.name: Vehicle Speed
engineData.description: Monitors the current vehicle speed.

engineData.name: Timing Advance
engineData.description: Monitors the timing advance of the engine.

engineData.name: Throttle Position
engineData.description: Monitors the current throttle position.

engineData.name: Oxygen Sensors
engineData.description: Monitors the oxygen sensors in the vehicle.

engineData.name: Run Time
engineData.description: Monitors the total engine running time.

engineData.name: Distance with MIL
engineData.description: Monitors the distance traveled with MIL (Malfunction Indicator Lamp) on.

engineData.name: Fuel Rail Pressure
engineData.description: Monitors the fuel rail pressure in the vehicle.

engineData.name: EGR Commander
engineData.description: Monitors the EGR (Exhaust Gas Recirculation) command status.

engineData.name: DTC List
engineData.description: Monitors the Diagnostic Trouble Code (DTC) list.

engineData.name: Fuel Tank Level
engineData.description: Monitors the current fuel tank level.

engineData.name: Total Distance
engineData.description: Monitors the total distance traveled.

engineData.name: Air-Fuel Ratio
engineData.description: Monitors the air-fuel ratio of the engine.

engineData.name: Ambient Air Temperature
engineData.description: Monitors the ambient air temperature.

engineData.name: Oil Temperature
engineData.description: Monitors the oil temperature of the engine.

engineData.name: Exhaust Gas Temperature
engineData.description: Monitors the exhaust gas temperature.

engineData.name: NOx Sensor
engineData.description: Monitors the NOx (Nitrogen Oxide) sensor status.
